message:
At the AMCDRR, shared a 10 point agenda for giving a greater boost to our efforts towards disaster risk reduction. 

A strong disaster management apparatus will contribute to the progress of Asia-Pacific region, which is already undergoing many changes. Gladdening to see several Asian nations having dedicated institutions leading the disaster risk management efforts. In an era of rapid urbanisation, we need to ensure we have the preparedness to overcomes disasters in urban areas & minimise damages. 
http://nm-4.com/fxjy
